name: Magneto
author: beastymario
notes:
I was determined to get to KOG with my magnet/Gaia deck. Only lost 6 games from Plat 1 to KOG.
The only cards that I was changing were :
+1 gamma, +1 painful decision, -1 srh, -1 Econ. And that was depending on how often I was running into CA. 
MVP was Attack of the Moon and Gaia. Gaia would cuck hazy so hard. It's basically an offensive mirror wall.
